trial_type.Description: Indicator of emotion regulation type to perform when emotionally valenced images are presented

Levels.dn: Diminish emotion elicited by negative images
Levels.dp: Diminish emotion elicited by positive images
Levels.in: Intensify emotion elicited by negative images
Levels.ip: Intensify emotion elicited by positive images

rating.Description: Indicator of emotional intensity after performing emotion regulation (0 if no response is made)

response_time.Description: time spent until the last button press (9 if no response is made)

identifier.LongName: International Affective Picture System (IAPS) database identifier
identifier.Description: IAPS image ID used to elicit emotions
